genAlarm.name: genAlarm

revisions.description: V01.01.00 - Moved ZhoneAlarmTypeId and ZhoneAlarmSeverity to Zhone-TC.mib - Added zhoneAlarmActiveVariableResourceId.

genAlarm.contactinfo: Postal: Zhone Technologies, Inc. @ Zhone Way 7001 Oakport Street Oakland, CA 94621 USA Toll-Free: +1 877-ZHONE20 (+1 877-946-6320) Tel: +1-510-777-7000 Fax: +1-510-777-7001 E-mail: support@zhone.com

ZhoneAlarmActiveVariableValue.name: ZhoneAlarmActiveVariableValue
ZhoneAlarmActiveVariableValue.description: The type of the varbind value. One and only one of the value objects that follows is used for a given row in this table.

zhoneAlarm.name: zhoneAlarm
zhoneAlarm.description: This entry list contains tables of the active outstanding alarms in a system. It also provides statistical information in terms of total # of active alarms raised.

zhoneAlarmActiveOverflowCnt.name: zhoneAlarmActiveOverflowCnt
zhoneAlarmActiveOverflowCnt.description: The number of active alarms that have not been put into the alarmActiveTable since system restart as a result of extreme resource constraints. This counter wrapped around once it reaches its maximum value.

zhoneAlarmActiveStatsCurrentCnt.name: zhoneAlarmActiveStatsCurrentCnt
zhoneAlarmActiveStatsCurrentCnt.description: The total number of currently active alarms on the system. This counter wrapped around once it reaches its maximum value.

zhoneAlarmActiveStatsTotalCnt.name: zhoneAlarmActiveStatsTotalCnt
zhoneAlarmActiveStatsTotalCnt.description: The total number of active alarms since system restarted. This counter wrapped around once it reaches its maximum value.

zhoneAlarmClearStatsTotalCnt.name: zhoneAlarmClearStatsTotalCnt
zhoneAlarmClearStatsTotalCnt.description: The total number of cleared alarms since system restarted. This counter wrapped around once it reaches its maximum value.

zhoneAlarmLastRaised.name: zhoneAlarmLastRaised
zhoneAlarmLastRaised.description: The value of sysUpTime at the time of the last alarm raise for this alarm list. If no alarm raises have occurred since the last re-initialization of the local network management subsystem, then this object contains a zero value.

zhoneAlarmLastCleared.name: zhoneAlarmLastCleared
zhoneAlarmLastCleared.description: The value of sysUpTime at the time of the last alarm clear for this alarm list. If no alarm clears have occurred since the last re-initialization of the local network management subsystem, then this object contains a zero value.

zhoneAlarmModelTable.name: zhoneAlarmModelTable
zhoneAlarmModelTable.description: This table contains the information in order to obtain the unique object instance id for every active alarm in the zhoneAlarmActiveTable.

zhoneAlarmModelEntry.name: zhoneAlarmModelEntry
zhoneAlarmModelEntry.description: The zhoneAlarmModeEntries indicate which variableId (Varbind #) indicates the object instance for which an active alarm was raised/cleared.

zhoneAlarmModelAlarmId.name: zhoneAlarmModelAlarmId
zhoneAlarmModelAlarmId.description: This entry specifies the alarm ID number.

zhoneAlarmModelNotificationId.name: zhoneAlarmModelNotificationId
zhoneAlarmModelNotificationId.description: The trap object identifier (OID) value that allows for the given alarmTypeId to be set or cleared. This value is used as an index to the zhoneAlarmModelTable.

zhoneAlarmModelVariableId.name: zhoneAlarmModelVariableId
zhoneAlarmModelVariableId.description: The zhoneAlarmModelVariableId identifies the varbind number for a given alarmActiveId and NotificationId that contains the unique object instance that raised/cleared that alarm.

zhoneAlarmModelDescription.name: zhoneAlarmModelDescription
zhoneAlarmModelDescription.description: This entry provides a text information of the alarm.

zhoneAlarmActiveTable.name: zhoneAlarmActiveTable
zhoneAlarmActiveTable.description: A table of Active Outstanding Alarm entries in a system.

zhoneAlarmActiveEntry.name: zhoneAlarmActiveEntry
zhoneAlarmActiveEntry.description: Entries appear in this table when alarms are raised. The active alarm entries are removed when the alarm is cleared. If under extreme resource constraint the system is unable to add any more entries into this table, then the alarmActiveOverflow statistic will be increased by one.

zhoneAlarmActiveId.name: zhoneAlarmActiveId
zhoneAlarmActiveId.description: This entry specifies the alarm ID number.

zhoneAlarmActiveResourceId.name: zhoneAlarmActiveResourceId
zhoneAlarmActiveResourceId.description: This object identifies the resource under alarm. The resource id can be determined based on the varbind # that determines the resource id. The mapping of which varbind defines the resource id is defined in the zhoneAlarmModelTable. For every alarmTypeId, there is a definition of which traps set/clear that alarm and the varbind number that determines the object instance that the alarm is raised/cleared (resource id). If there is no corresponding resource, then the value of this object is 0.0.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariables.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariables
zhoneAlarmActiveVariables.description: The number of variables (varbinds) in alarmActiveVariableTable for this alarm.

zhoneAlarmActiveNotificationId.name: zhoneAlarmActiveNotificationId
zhoneAlarmActiveNotificationId.description: The Trap object identifier of the alarm state transition that is occurring. This entry indicates the trap oid that caused the alarm to be raised.

zhoneAlarmActiveSeverity.name: zhoneAlarmActiveSeverity
zhoneAlarmActiveSeverity.description: This entry identifies the severity level of the alarm.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariableTable.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariableTable
zhoneAlarmActiveVariableTable.description: A table of variables to go with each active alarm entries.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariableEntry.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariableEntry
zhoneAlarmActiveVariableEntry.description: Entries appear in this table when there are variables in the varbind list of a corresponding alarm in zhoneAlarmActiveTable. Entries appear in this table as though the trap/notification had been transported using zhone Trap definition.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariableValueType.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariableValueType
zhoneAlarmActiveVariableValueType.description: The type of the value. One and only one of the value objects that follow is used for a given row in this table, based on this type.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariableOpaqueVal.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariableOpaqueVal
zhoneAlarmActiveVariableOpaqueVal.description: The value when alarmActiveVariableType is 'opaque'. Note that although RFC2578 [RFC2578] forbids the use of Opaque in 'standard' MIB modules, this particular usage is driven by the need to be able to accurately represent any well-formed notification, and justified by the need for backward compatibility.

zhoneAlarmActiveVariableResourceId.name: zhoneAlarmActiveVariableResourceId
zhoneAlarmActiveVariableResourceId.description: This is the instance OID for the variable binding whose instance OID is different from that of the zhoneAlarmActiveResourceId. If this instance OID is not required or the same as zhoneAlarmActiveResourceId, it will have a default value of 0.0. For example: atmVclOperStatusChange would have ifIndex.vpi.vci as its alarm resource Id. But for the trap variable binding of zhoneTrapPort, the instance id is 0.

zhoneAlarmGroup.name: zhoneAlarmGroup
zhoneAlarmGroup.description: Alarm MIB Group Definition for all Alarm MIB Entries.
